channel.title: Help modifying and tweaking theif shooting game script
channel.description: This is a relatively simple game which is to shoot the thieves you see but it gets really tedious when it gets harder...so can someone make a script scar can run that will click on the thieves at the fastest time possible? [img]http://img164.imageshack.us/img164/5707/thief1wx.png[/img]

item.title: Help modifying and tweaking theif shooting game script
item.dc:creator: @xxhellfirexx xxhellfirexx
item.description:
@xxhellfirexx wrote:

[quote=“doomsday, post:20, topic:2735”]okay, here we go

i made it better adn everything, i got a perfect score of 1000(max amount of bullets)

program New;

var
x,y:integer;

begin
clickmouse(246,152,true)
repeat
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,50,50,177,106) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,199,35,309,142) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,344,142,416,230) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,374,252,461,309) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,20,268,325,305) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,124,193,186,262) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(500)
until(false)
end.
[/code][/quote]



great scripts....I spent some time modifying it however it misses the theif shooting between the arches on the middle right part of the game screen. Can anyone please modify the script below to solve this problem?
[code]program New;

var
x,y:integer;

begin
clickmouse(246,152,true)
repeat
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,50,50,177,106) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(67)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,199,35,309,142) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(67)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,344,142,416,230) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(65)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,374,252,461,309) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(67)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,20,268,325,305) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(65)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,374,252,293,148) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(67)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,527,-136,253,80) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(38)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,444,47,253,80) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(67)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,363,233,593,422) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(34)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,124,193,186,262) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(75)
if FindColor(x,y,0,538,370,535,369) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(48)
until(false)
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Help modifying and tweaking theif shooting game script
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

okay, here we go

i made it better adn everything, i got a perfect score of 1000(max amount of bullets)

program New;

var
x,y:integer;

begin
clickmouse(246,152,true)
repeat
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,50,50,177,106) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,199,35,309,142) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,344,142,416,230) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,374,252,461,309) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,20,268,325,305) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if FindColor(x,y,10996476,124,193,186,262) then clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(500)
until(false)
end.

item.title: Help modifying and tweaking theif shooting game script
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

screw it, here you go. but i cant garuntee anything because your keeping me away from the game for whatever reason of your own. doesnt make sense to me, but oh well.

{#####################################)
(## URL: Declined To Me x.x         ##)
(##                                 ##)
(##    Script Made By KyleGut3      ##)
(##                                 ##)
(## Instructions:                   ##)
(## Select The Game Window And Run, ##)
(#####################################}


program TheifShooter;
{.include squig2.txt}

Var
 x,y :integer;

Const
 tcolor1=8760826; //Don't change
 tcolor2=10996476; //Don't change

procedure KillTarget;
begin
 if(FindColor(x,y,tcolor1,1,1,550,400) or FindColor(x,y,tcolor2,1,1,550,400))then
 begin
  MouseC(x,y,1);
 end;
end;


begin
 repeat
  KillTarget;
  wait(100);
 until(False);
end.

Read full topic
